hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who patiently endures the hardships of it (of this city of Medina), I would be an intercessor or a withness on his behalf on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّرْغِيبِ فِي سُكْنَى الْمَدِينَةِ وَالصَّبْرِ عَلَى لأْوَائِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to live in Al-Madinah and to be patient on bearing its distress and hardships
